body_content.explanation: a mistake made when writing down something that has been said or sung, or when changing something into a different written form :
examples: There were several mistranscriptions of consonants.

body_content.explanation: the fact of making a mistake or mistakes when writing down something that has been said or sung, or when changing something into a different written form:
examples: Some of the structural forms in the data reflect possible mistranscription errors.
There were problems with data mis-transcription from sources in the literature.
